text: Rudheath Senior Academy, formerly University of Chester Academy Northwich, is a medium-sized co-educational academy that educates approximately 420 children between 11 and 16 years of age. It is located in the village of Rudheath, near Northwich in Cheshire, England. The school is a specialist college for the arts, and a modern Performing Arts block has recently been built to fit this need. The school is sponsored by North West Academies Trust. ==References== ==External links== *Academy website *Current OFSTED report Category:Secondary schools in Cheshire West and Chester Category:Academies in Cheshire West and Chester Category:University of Chester Academies Trust
title: University of Chester Academy Northwich
